sentences.en: As far as Africans are concerned, both these avenues of advancement are deliberately curtailed by legislation.
sentences.cn: 就南非黑人而言, 这两条向上发展之路均受到立法的蓄意限制.

sentences.en: Do you think this job will has good advancement for the future?
sentences.cn: 您认为这个工作有光明的前途 吗 ?

sentences.en: Efforts to conserve the environment sometimes clash with the advancement of technology.
sentences.cn: 致力环境保护有时和发展技术相矛盾.

sentences.en: He cared little for social advancement.
sentences.cn: 他几乎不在乎社会地位的升迁。

sentences.en: He was always ready to snatch at any opportunity for advancement.
sentences.cn: 他总是抢著抓住任何晋升的机会.

sentences.en: His advancement to major came two years ago.
sentences.cn: 他于两年前被提升为少校.

sentences.en: His new contribution to the advancement of physiology was well appreciated.
sentences.cn: 他对生理学发展的新贡献获得高度赞赏.

sentences.en: Human rights advancement itself is a content and reflection of human development.
sentences.cn: 人权进步本身就是人类发展的内容和体现.

sentences.en: I confess that I can hardly venture, at my age, to look for such advancement.
sentences.cn: 我承认, 在我这年龄, 已几乎不大敢冀望这样的提升.

sentences.en: My reason for leaving is simply that I see no chance of advancement.
sentences.cn: 我离职的原因只是因为看不到晋升的机会.

sentences.en: None of us should ever underestimate the degree of difficulty women face in career advancement.
sentences.cn: 我们谁都不应该低估女性在事业发展过程中所面临的困难程度。

sentences.en: The advancement of good new ideas is hampered by the careerism of scientists.
sentences.cn: 新生事物的发展受到野心派科学家的阻挠。

sentences.en: The aim of a university should be the advancement of learning.
sentences.cn: 大学的目标应是促进学术.

sentences.en: Their means were as different as their objects and equally suited to the advancement of each.
sentences.cn: 她们俩的方法之不同就如同她们的对象之不同一样,她们倒也都能达到各自的目的.

sentences.en: There are good opportunities for advancement within the company.
sentences.cn: 公司里有良好的晋升机会.

sentences.en: There were side issues in the advancement of naturalism.
sentences.cn: 比起倡导自然主义来,这些都是次要的事情.

前进者；相位超前补偿器，进相机
前进；增加；上涨（advance的过去式和过去分词形式）
